author: matildaclerke
content: I just put together a basic history pruner. I'll need to modify it to work on testnets. I'm not sure what Besu will do if it tries to access the pre-merge data and finds it missing... that may require a bit more effort to make sure it doesn't just explode

author: _shemnon
content: Do we need to propose a transaction maximum gas EIP before we get too excited about 90m gas blocks?  Should one TX be able to burn 90m gas?
